document.full_text: the vancouver canucks will have to shake some rust off their skates when they finally take to the ice on wednesday against the boston bruins in the nhl's stanley cup championship.
document.title: vancouver to brush away cobwebs against boston
lines_and_colors: the vancouver canucks will have to shake some rust off their skates when they finally take to the ice on wednesday against the boston bruins in the nhl's stanley cup championship.
